entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
